nodes.text: The Kitonak Connection is a mini adventure for use in the Rebellion era, but it can be adapted easily to the Rise of the Empire era or The New Jedi Order era, published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by J.D. Wiker and published on May 22, 2003.

The adventure follows the events of Positive ID and puts the heroes on the trail of a Hutt gangster on the lawless smuggler's moon of Nar Shaddaa. The characters must use wits and detective work - and a fair amount of intimidation and firepower - to follow the clues back to the Hutt who orchestrated the whole affair.
The Kitonak Connection is intended for four player characters of 6th level.
The heroes start with meeting Torga the Hutt, who hires them to investigate the death of his advisor Nak Simm.
They gather clues, which eventually leads them to a plot hatched by Jolla the Hutt to deal with Torga and Moska.
The game offers multiple endings, depending on which Hutt the players choose to confront.
